data.title: Rogers Prize
data.text: Saba Lepsveridze and Yihang Sun with mentor Mehtaab Sawhney Size of the Largest Sum-Free Set in $[n]^3$ Daniel Santiago and Isaac Lopez with mentor Michael Law Positive Mass theorems for asymptotically euclidean smooth metric measure spaces Kenta Suzuki and mentor Hao Peng Gelfand-Kirillov Dimension of Representations of GL(n) over a Non-Archimedean Local Field Dain Kim and Anqi Li and mentor Jonathan Tidor Cubic Goldreich-Levin Daishi Kiyohara and mentor Feng Gui A new approach to the upper estimate of lattice points on a curve via $ell^2$ decoupling Kevin Chang and mentor Robert Burklund Towards the v_1-periodic Adams spectral sequence for the mod 2 Moore spectrum Carl Schildkraut, William Zhao and mentor Chun Hong Lo Relating counts in different characteristics for Steiner's conic problem Hans Yu and mentor Jonathan Tidor Joints of varieties Yuan Yao, Shengtong Zhang and mentor Jonathan Tidor Equiangular Lines with a Fixed Angle Douglas Stryker and mentor Ao Sun Codimension Bounds and Rigidity of Ancient Mean Curvature Flows by the Tangent Flow at -$\infty$ Quiyu Ren and mentor Yuqui Fu On the Union of Essentially Distinct $\delta$-tubes Lingfu Zhang and mentor Hong Wang Refinements of the 2-Dimensional Strichartz Estimate using the Maximum Wave Packet Saarik Kalia and mentor Ben Yang Generalizations of the Szemeredi-Trotter Theorem
